Subscription.Description: Forward errors related to event forwarding
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <!-- Event forwarding log errors --> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Forwarding/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Forwarding/Operational">*[System[(Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3)]]</Select> </Query>
<!-- Forward all logs from the EventCollector service --> <Query Id="1" Path="Microsoft-Windows-EventCollector/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Forwarding/Operational">*</Select> </Query>
<!-- Capture events about not being able to log to the Security Event Log --> <Query Id="2" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=521)]]</Select> </Query>
</QueryList>
